title: Special Operations Asset Management
description: A C2 operator must coordinate air, ground, and intelligence assets to support a special operations team conducting a raid.

tasks.description: Maintain real-time tracking of the ground team and all supporting assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator keeps a constant, accurate plot of all friendly forces.

tasks.description: Receive a request from the ground team for immediate drone surveillance of a nearby building.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly processes the request for support.

tasks.description: Dynamically re-task a nearby ISR drone to provide video of the requested building and stream the feed to the ground team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully re-tasks the drone and provides the requested intelligence.
